sn44.1:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn44.1:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena khemā bhikkhunī kosalesu cārikaṃ caramānā antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca sāketaṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ vāsaṃ upagatā hoti.
sn44.1:4.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo sāketā sāvatthiṃ gacchanto, antarā ca sāketaṃ antarā ca sāvatthiṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi.
sn44.1:4.4: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn44.1:4.5: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, toraṇavatthusmiṃ tathārūpaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā jāna yamahaṃ ajja payirupāseyyan”ti.
sn44.1:5.1: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho so puriso rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā kevalakappaṃ toraṇavatthuṃ āhiṇḍanto nāddasa tathārūpaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā yaṃ rājā pasenadi kosalo payirupāseyya.
sn44.1:5.2: Addasā kho so puriso khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ vāsaṃ upagataṃ.
sn44.1:5.3: Disvāna yena rājā pasenadi kosalo tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.1:6.1: “Natthi kho, deva, toraṇavatthusmiṃ tathārūpo samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yaṃ devo payirupāseyya.
sn44.1:6.2: Atthi ca kho, deva, khemā nāma bhikkhunī, tassa bhagavato sāvikā arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn44.1:6.3: Tassā kho pana ayyāya evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
sn44.1:7.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena khemā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.1:7.2: upasaṅkamitvā khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.1:7.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca:
sn44.1:7.4: “kiṃ nu kho, ayye, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:7.7: “Kiṃ panayye, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:7.10: “Kiṃ nu kho, ayye, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:7.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.1:7.13: “Kiṃ panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti.
sn44.1:7.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.1:8.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, ayye, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭhā samānā:
sn44.1:8.4: ‘Kiṃ panayye, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭhā samānā:
sn44.1:8.6: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:8.7: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, ayye, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭhā samānā:
sn44.1:8.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:8.10: ‘Kiṃ panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭhā samānā:
sn44.1:8.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:8.13: Ko nu kho, ayye, hetu, ko paccayo yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.1:9.2: Yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākareyyāsi.
sn44.1:9.3: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, atthi te koci gaṇako vā muddiko vā saṅkhāyako vā yo pahoti gaṅgāya vālukaṃ gaṇetuṃ—
sn44.1:9.4: ettakā vālukā iti vā, ettakāni vālukasatāni iti vā, ettakāni vālukasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni vālukasatasahassāni iti vā”ti?
sn44.1:9.6: “Atthi pana te koci gaṇako vā muddiko vā saṅkhāyako vā yo pahoti mahāsamudde udakaṃ gaṇetuṃ—
sn44.1:9.7: ettakāni udakāḷhakāni iti vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasatāni iti vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassāni iti vā”ti?
sn44.1:9.11: “* Evameva kho, mahārāja, yena rūpena tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya taṃ rūpaṃ tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn44.1:9.12: Rūpasaṅkhāyavimutto kho, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—
sn44.1:9.14: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:10.1: Yāya vedanāya tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, sā vedanā tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn44.1:10.2: Vedanāsaṅkhāyavimutto, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—
sn44.1:10.4: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:11.2: yehi saṅkhārehi tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, te saṅkhārā tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn44.1:11.3: Saṅkhārasaṅkhāyavimutto kho, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—
sn44.1:11.5: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:12.1: Yena viññāṇena tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya taṃ viññāṇaṃ tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn44.1:12.2: Viññāṇasaṅkhāyavimutto kho, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—
sn44.1:12.4: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upetī”ti.
sn44.1:12.5: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo khemāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn44.1:13.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo aparena samayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.1:13.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.1:13.4: “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:13.7: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:13.10: “Kiṃ nu kho, bhante, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:13.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.1:13.13: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.1:13.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.1:13.16: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bhante, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.1:13.18: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi … pe ….
sn44.1:13.19: “‘Kiṃ pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.1:13.21: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:13.22: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.1:14.2: Yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākareyyāsi.

sn44.1:14.14: Rūpasaṅkhāyavimutto kho, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—

sn44.1:15.1: Yena viññāṇena tathāgataṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, taṃ viññāṇaṃ tathāgatassa pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn44.1:15.2: Viññāṇasaṅkhāyavimutto kho, mahārāja, tathāgato gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāho—
sn44.1:15.4: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi na upetī”ti.
sn44.1:16.2: Yatra hi nāma satthu ceva sāvikāya ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati yadidaṃ aggapadasmiṃ.
sn44.1:16.3: Ekamidāhaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ apucchiṃ.
sn44.1:16.4: Sāpi me ayyā etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi etamatthaṃ byākāsi, seyyathāpi bhagavā.
sn44.1:16.6: Yatra hi nāma satthu ceva sāvikāya ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati yadidaṃ aggapadasmiṃ.
sn44.1:16.10: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
